subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)

Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Huskies will play Butler on Monday, giving Jim Calhoun a chance to become the fifth Division I men’s coach to win three national championships.
snippet: The Huskies will play Butler on Monday, giving Jim Calhoun a chance to become the fifth Division I men’s coach to win three national championships.
